Title: Kilometre Zero
Actors: Nazmî Kirik, Eyam Ekrem, Belçim Bilgin, Ehmed Qeladizeni
Plot: In the late 80's, in the small village of Amedi, the Kurd electrician Ako is forced to leave his family and join the Iraqi army to fight in Basra against Iran. When he is assigned to escort the coffin of a deceased soldier to his family, the crosses the country with an Arab driver and plots a scheme to desert the army and bring his wife and son to Paris.
